This world is our own fault, we're being punished for
our insolence and pride, the same things that cause
Satan to fall, the thing is Gods giving us a second
chance, don't miss out.  I'll pray for you.

--- Hollywood Narrator Countdown <thecode@...>
wrote:
> OOC: There is no God. If any God looked at me, I'd
> kick him square in the nuts. This world is ******...
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Kyle Stewart
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Tuesday, August 06, 2002 7:12 AM
>   Subject: Re: ooC: people...
> 
> 
>   Yes they should, all the posts I'm sending in on
> this
>   subject are attempting to keep the piece (ironic
> since
>   this is one of the few times I didn't help take it
>   away to start with).  Now everyone kiss and say
> you're
>   sorry then start going to church to help learn
> about
>   controling your anger, and God's love (just a
>   suggestion, and don't complain I shouldn't be
>   preaching here, we're suppose to minister
> everywhere
>   as Christians, and theirs a note to a church in
> the
>   bible which is suspected to also be a note to
> this,
>   possibly the last period in the churches existance
>   before Christ returns complaining we are "luke
> warm"
>   and since we're neither hot nor cold he'll spit us
> out
>   of his mouth, or in other words I'm suppose to
> preach
>   to everyone I can everywhere I can).
> 
>   --- Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@...>
>   wrote:
>   > 
>   > OOC: Not to jump in in the middle of this, but
>   > couldn't your differences be taken care of out
> of
>   > the RPG? It's not like you don't have each
> others

>   > everyday is all of you fighting about this or
> that.
>   > Shouldn't you care about the RPing instead of
> what
>   > someone is saying about you? 
>   > With love, 
>   > The Vampire Lestat

> Let's
>   > look at what Cardhead said. "I'll stop when they

>   > isn't he? What a hypocrite...    ----- Original
>   > Message -----  From: cardhead649  To:
>   > nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com  Sent: Monday, August 05,
>   > 2002 7:48 AM Subject: Re: ooC: people... 
>   > I'll stop when they do.  But Rauq, even you have
> to
>   > admit that HNC's 
>   > inaugural rp post wasn't worth the time it took
> to
>   > read the first 
>   > line, let alone the whole thing.  And Lurker's
>   > start-up is the most 
>   > over-dramatized entrance I've ever seen - all
> you
>   > need is a shot of 
>   > Dr. Frankenstein throwing a switch and it's a
> ripoff
>   > of every single 
>   > horror movie out there.  
>   > 
>   > It's improved somewhat since then.
>   > 
>   > As far as characters are concerned, Terminion
> and 
>   > Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both
>   > personality and 
>   > potential.  The remaining four have been
>   > cannon-fodder thus far.
>   > 
>   > That's my opinion and it's up to you guys to
> prove
>   > me right or wrong 
>   > by roleplaying, not bitching.  And this is a
> serious
>   > RPG, not a 
>   > slapstick movie, so if I see another
> post/exchange
>   > like HNC's first 
>   > one, where everyone involved is an absolute
> idiot, I
>   > will ingore 
>   > every post thereafter made by the perpetrator(s)
>   > regardless of who 
>   > they are or think they are.
>   >
